verse: Address and Greeting. Paul, by the will of God an apostle of Christ Jesus, to the saints who are in Ephesus and are faithful in Christ Jesus.
Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
I further pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened so that you may know the hope to which he has called you, how rich and glorious is his inheritance in the saints,
and how immeasurably great is the power that he has exercised toward those who have faith.
